metadata.title: ERS-1, ERS-2, RADARSAT  Synthetic Aperture Images of Bering Sea
metadata.description: ERS-1, ERS-2, RADARSAT  Synthetic aperture images of Bering Sea.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Mesoscale ocean features, such as eddies, fronts, internal waves, wind streaks, surface films and ship wakes.    Also ice edge, ice flow and polynya observations

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: ERS-1 and 2 RADARSAT, principal Investigator or approved by NASA Headquarters

Use constraints: Copyright protected by ESA and CSA. Give credit to ESA and CSA.
